mapper.select: select * from game_and_place where p_no=#{p_no} order by g_no
mapper.insert: insert into game_and_place (p_no, g_no, gnp_price, gnp_credit, gnp_detail) values (#{p_no}, #{g_no}, #{gnp_price}, #{gnp_credit}, #{gnp_detail})
mapper.update: update game_and_place set p_no=#{p_no}, g_no=#{g_no}, gnp_price=#{gnp_price}, gnp_credit=#{gnp_credit}, gnp_detail=#{gnp_detail} where gnp_no=#{gnp_no}
